module.name: Call Forward
module.changelog: *15.0.11* Packaging of ver 15.0.11 *15.0.10* Related to FREEPBX-20414: removed $jobid from runRestore() *15.0.9* Fixes FREEPBX-20445: Check, if index 'data' exists in $configs before accessing it *15.0.8* Call Forwarding Restore Fails *15.0.7* backup *15.0.6* fixing legacy restore *15.0.5* backup and restore *15.0.4* Rest Api *15.0.3* Feature parity with restapi module *15.0.2* Packaging of ver 15.0.2 *15.0.1* Fork from 14.0.1.3, impliment backup
